data.name: LOLLIPOP: SUMMER!
data.detailed_description:
NEW GAME DANGO!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1900930/DANGO/


About the Game



LOLLIPOP: SUMMER! is an exciting puzzle game with delicious, sweet candy combinations! In the game LOLLIPOP: SUMMER! You will find many bright and varied visuals, very beautiful music and many achievements.



In this game you need to correctly match the same candies in a row so that they disappear (no matter in which direction), collect points, and open new levels.
After each completed level, you will discover new pictures ! Collect the required number of points and conquer one level after another!

With "LOLLIPOP: SUMMER!" You will be able to breathe from difficult games, you will immerse yourself in the world of various, colorful candies and nice music.
Here you will find an amazing variety of new levels, a beautiful gallery, animation and pleasant music!
Collecting colorful candies will become more and more interesting with each new level! Enjoy an interesting game! Many interesting levels with stunning graphics are waiting for you!

What you can find in this game:


Challenging and interesting levels at the same time.

Incredible graphics and animation.

Incredible sound and visual effects.

At each level, new pictures.

Relax and have a great time.

Artist: @yuuzuki_hijiri

data.short_description: LOLLIPOP: SUMMER! is an exciting puzzle game with delicious, sweet candy combinations! In the game LOLLIPOP: SUMMER! You will find many bright and varied visuals, very beautiful music and many achievements.
data.supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7 / 8.1 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 Serise or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7 / 8.1 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Serise or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final
